Small Apartment: **$12,000 -** Each lease lets you live in an apartment for two weeks!
News Station: **$2,000 -** Each lease lets you operate a news station for two weeks!
Empty Storefront: **$5,000 -** Each lease lets you operate an empty storefront for two weeks!
Business Down Payment: **$10,000 -** Down payment that is redeemable for a business, if you have all the other necessities!
Law Tuition: **$220,335 -** Tuition used to attend law school, and eventually get a law degree!
